attributes.action: Revoke the Communications Act 2003 and the Communications (Television Licensing) Regulations 2005 regarding the need for a TV licence fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Revoke the Communications Act 2003 and the Communications (Television Licensing) Regulations 2005, whereby a licence is required in order to install or use a television receiver to receive television programmes, regardless of the source. In other words, no more TV licence fee.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
